Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 4,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - Auxiliary Files,NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 1,NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3,10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment,Slide-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Self-identifier for this data file - HTAN ID of this file HTAN ID SOP (eg HTANx_yyy_zzz)

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Indicate if this is Read 1 (R1), Read 2 (R2), Index Reads 1 (I1), Index Reads 2 (I2),  or Other
Valid Values: R1 R2 R1&R2 I1 I2 Other

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Read 1 content description
Valid Values: cDNA Spatial Barcode and UMI

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Read 2 content description
Valid Values: cDNA Spatial Barcode and UMI

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Process which results in the creation of a library from fragments of DNA using cloning vectors or oligonucleotides with the role of adaptors [OBI_0000711]
Valid Values: Smart-seq2 Smart-SeqV4 10xV1.0 10xV1.1 10xV2 10xV3 10xV3.1 Drop-seq inDropsV2 inDropsV3 TruDrop Nextera XT

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Number of days between sample for assay was received in lab and the libraries were prepared for sequencing [number]. If not applicable please enter 'Not Applicable'

Attribute: Sequencing Library Construction Days from Index
Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Number of days between sample for assay was received in lab and day of sequencing library construction [number]. If not applicable please enter 'Not Applicable'

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: The end of the cDNA molecule that is preferentially sequenced, e.g. 3/5 prime tag/end or the full length transcript
Valid Values: 3 Prime 5 Prime Full Length Transcript

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: An oligo to which new deoxyribonucleotides can be added by DNA polymerase [SO_0000112]. The type of primer used for reverse transcription, e.g. oligo-dT or random primer. This allows users to identify content of the cDNA library input e.g. enriched for mRNA
Valid Values: Oligo-dT Poly-dT Feature barcoding Random

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: A platform is an object aggregate that is the set of instruments and software needed to perform a process [OBI_0000050]. Specific model of the sequencing instrument.
Valid Values: Illumina Next Seq 500 Illumina Next Seq 550 Illumina Next Seq 2500 Illumina NovaSeq 6000 Illumina MiSeq 454 GS FLX Titanium AB SOLiD 4 AB SOLiD 2 AB SOLiD 3 Complete Genomics Illumina HiSeq X Ten Illumina HiSeq X Five Illumina Genome Analyzer II Illumina Genome Analyzer IIx Illumina HiSeq 2000 Illumina HiSeq 2500 Illumina HiSeq 4000 Illumina NextSeq Ion Torrent PGM Ion Torrent Proton Ion Torrent S5 PacBio RS NovaSeq 6000 NovaSeqS4 Ultima Genomics UG100 Oxford Nanopore minION GridION PromethION PacBio Sequel2 Revio Illumina NextSeq 1000 Illumina NextSeq 2000 Other unknown Not Reported

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - Auxiliary Files
Description: Area (or Capture Area) - One of the either four or two active regions where tissue can be placed on a Visium slide. Each area is intended to contain only one tissue sample. Slide areas are named consecutively from top to bottom: A1, B1, C1, D1 for Visium slides with 6.5 mm Capture Area and A, B for CytAssist slides with 11 mm Capture Area. Both CytAssist slides with 6.5 mm Capture Area and Gateway Slides contain only two slide areas, A1 and D1.
Valid Values: A B C D A1 B1 C1 D1

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment,Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Protocols.io ID or DOI link to a free/open protocol resource describing in detail the assay protocol (e.g. surface markers used in Smart-seq, dissociation duration,  lot/batch numbers for key reagents such as primers, sequencing reagent kits, etc.) or the protocol by which the sample was obtained or generated.

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: Version of imaging slide used. Slide version is critical for the analysis of the sequencing data as different slides have different capture area layouts.
Valid Values: V1 V2 V3 V4

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - Auxiliary Files,10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: For Visium, it is the unique identifier printed on the label of each Visium slide. The serial number starts with V followed by a number which can range between one through five and ends with a dash and a three digit number, such as 123. For CosMx, this refers to the loaded Flow Cell ID. For Xenium, this ID indicates the slide orientation, as it matches the relative location of the ID on the physical Xenium slide.

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: To ensure good fiducial alignment and tissue spots detection, it is important to correct for this shift in orientation.
Valid Values: TRUE FALSE

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: Fixed and stained tissue sections are permeabilized for different times. Each Capture Area captures polyadenylated mRNA from the attached tissue section. Measure is provided in minutes.

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: A numerical assessment of the integrity of RNA based on the entire electrophoretic trace of the RNA sample including the presence or absence of degradation products. Number

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: Represents the percentage of RNA fragments that are >200 nucleotides in size. Number

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 2
Description: MD5 checksum of the BAM file

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 4,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - Auxiliary Files,Slide-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: HTAN Data File Identifier indicating the file(s) from which these files were derived

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 2
Description: SAM tag for the UMI field; please provide a valid UB, UMI (e.g. UB:Z or UR:Z)

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2
Description: Link to file listing all possible spatial barcodes. URL

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 2
Description: SAM tag for spot barcode field; please provide a valid spot barcode tag (e.g. CB:Z)

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 2
Description: Was Hard Trimming applied
Valid Values: Yes - Applied Hard Trimming no

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 4,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - Auxiliary Files,Slide-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Major version of the workflow (e.g. Cell Ranger v3.1)

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 4,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - Auxiliary Files,Slide-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Link to workflow or command. DockStore.org recommended. URL
Conditional If: Pseudo Alignment Used is "Yes - Pseudo Alignment Used"

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 2
Description: Exact version of the human genome reference used in the alignment of reads (e.g. GCF_000001405.39)
Conditional If: Pseudo Alignment Used is "Yes - Pseudo Alignment Used"

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 2
Description: Link to human genome sequence (e.g. ftp://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/gencode/Gencode_human/release_34/GRCh38.primary_assembly.genome.fa.gz)
Conditional If: Pseudo Alignment Used is "Yes - Pseudo Alignment Used"

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 2
Description: Link to the human genome annotation (GTF) file (e.g. ftp://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/gencode/Gencode_human/release_34/gencode.v34.annotation.gtf.gz)

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - Auxiliary Files
Description: The file type generated for the visium experiment.
Valid Values: reference png reference jpg json scale factors probe dataset csv qc result html filtered mex unfiltered mex tissue_positions barcodes features fiducial image png fiducial image jpg detected image png detected jpg high res image low res image

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3
Description: The number of barcodes associated with a spot under tissue.

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3
Description: The number of reads, both under and outside of tissue, divided by the number of barcodes associated with a spot under tissue.

Attribute: Median Number Genes per Spatial Spot
Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: The median number of genes detected per spot under tissue-associated barcode. Detection is defined as the presence of at least 1 UMI count.

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: The fraction of reads originating from an already-observed UMI. This is a function of library complexity and sequencing depth. More specifically, this is the fraction of confidently mapped, valid spot-barcode, valid UMI reads that had a non-unique (spot-barcode, UMI, gene).

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3
Description: Proportion of mapped reads collected from samtools. Number

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3
Description: Fraction of reads that mapped to a unique gene in the transcriptome. The read must be consistent with annotated splice junctions. These reads are considered for UMI counting.

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 3,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: The median number of UMI counts per tissue covered spot.

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 4
Description: Generic name for the workflow used to analyze the visium data set.

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 4
Description: Parameters used to run the workflow..

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 1
Description: The Synapse ID(s) associated with the PKC mapping file for the assay. Multiple files are listed as comma separated values.

Description: A platform is an object aggregate that is the set of instruments and software needed to perform a process [OBI_0000050]. Specific model of the sequencing instrument.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 1
Description: How RNA molecules are isolated.

Attribute: GeoMx DSP Library Preparation Kit Version
Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 1
Description: Version of Library Preparation Kit. String

Attribute: Synapse ID of GeoMx Lab Worksheet File
Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 1
Description: Synapse ID(s) of Lab Worksheet Files output from the GeoMx DSP workflow. Multiple files are listed as comma separated values.

Attribute: Synapse ID of GeoMx DSP ROI Segment Annotation File
Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3
Description: Total number of unique probes reported.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3
Description: Total number of unique genes reported.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3
Description: Exact version of the human genome reference used in the alignment of reads (e.g. https://www.gencodegenes.org/human/). Only applicable to some applications in GeoMx

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Type of data stored in matrix.
Valid Values: Raw Counts Normalized Counts Scaled Counts Batch Corrected Counts

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3
Description: Generic name for the workflow used to analyze the GeoMx DSP data set.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3
Description: Parameters used to run the GeoMx DSP workflow.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP Spatial Transcriptomics Level 3
Description: Link to workflow or command. DockStore.org recommended. URL

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment
Description: A comma separated list of filenames within the Xenium bundle zip file

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: ROI name (application generated). For Xenium this is referred to as the “region name”

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: The human-readable panel name. This could be the Gene Panel name or Protein Panel name. In Xenium, this refers to the string entered as the name in panel specification (e.g. Xenium Human Immuno-Oncology Add-on B Gene Expression). In CosMx, this refers to the panel name as it appears in the CosMx catalog (e.g. CosMx Human Universal Cell Characterization Panel (1000-plex))

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: The total number of cells analyzed on the flow cell

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: Refers to the target of an assay. Can be genes/transcripts or probes

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Surface area of the ROI in square microns (µm^2). In CosMx, this is referred to as the Scan Area. In Xenium, this is referred to as the Region Area

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: A comma-separated list with any number of channels the user deems appropriate(Example: PanCK, CD45, CD3, DAPI)

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: Mean or Median transcript count per cell analyzed on the flow cell or slide

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment,Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: The percentage of transcripts assigned to assayed cells

Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment
Description: In Xenium, this is the number of high-quality, decoded-to-gene nuclear transcripts divided by the total segmented nuclear area to get a transcript density (units are reported in 100um^2).

Attribute: Xenium IF image HTAN File ID
Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment
Description: The HTAN Data File ID of a Imaging Level 2 file

Attribute: Xenium HE image HTAN File ID
Manifest Name: 10X Genomics Xenium ISS Experiment
Description: The HTAN Data File ID of a Imaging Level 2 file

Manifest Name: Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: A comma separated list of filenames within the CosMx bundle zip file

Manifest Name: Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: The specification for barcodes on each image. Either RNA probe or protein antibody according to the assay
Valid Values: RNA protein

Manifest Name: Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: The total number of FOVs recorded for the sample on a single flow cell

Manifest Name: Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: The mean total transcripts per um3

Manifest Name: Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: The total unique genes detected above background

Manifest Name: Nanostring CosMx SMI Experiment
Description: Mean Total Negative probe counts/cell

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: The source of the input nucleic molecule
Valid Values: Single Cell Bulk Whole Cell Single Nucleus Bulk Nuclei Micro-region

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Offset in sequence for spot barcode read (in bp): number
Conditional If: Spatial Read2 is "Spatial Barcode and UMI"

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1,10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: Spot and transcript identifiers

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: A set of known synthetic RNA molecules with known sequence that are added to the cell lysis mix
Valid Values: ERCC Other Spike In No Spike In PhiX

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: A common term for all files belonging to the same cell or library. Provide a numbering of each library prep batch (can differ from encapsulation and sequencing batch)

Attribute: Nucleic Acid Capture Days from Index
Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Number of days between sample for single cell assay was received in lab and day of nucleic acid capture part of library construction (in number of days since sample received in lab) [number]. If not applicable please enter 'Not Applicable'

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Generic name for the workflow used to analyze the Slide-seq data set. String

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 2,Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Parameters used to run the Slide-seq workflow. String

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 2
Description: SAM tag for matched spot barcode field; please provide a valid spot barcode tag (e.g. CB:Z) (Slide-seq specific)

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Links samples to a specific local sequencer run. Can be string or 'null'

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Specific content type of the data file.
Valid Values: Gene Expression Transcript Expression Exon Expression Quantification Gene Expression Quantification Isoform Expression Quantification Splice Junction Quantification Other

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Number of sequenced beads. Applies to raw counts matrix only. Integer

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 3
Description: The type of Level 3 file submitted as part of the Slide-seq workflow.
Valid Values: Matrix Features Matrix Barcodes All Bead Locations All Bead Barcodes Matched Bead Barcodes Matched Bead Locations Not Applicable

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 3
Description: Average cDNA length associated with the experiemtn. Integer

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: GeoMx Scan name (as appears in Segment Summary)

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Similar to a Run ID, the slide name indicates the slide a given ROI is linked to (as reported in Segment Summary).

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Name given to segment at time of generation

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: X location within the image

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Y location within the image

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Unique descriptor of a variable group (ie. MAPK+)

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Height of the scan for GeoMx Analysis

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Width of the scan for GeoMx Analysis

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Offset X of the scan for GeoMx Analysis

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Offset Y of the scan for GeoMx Analysis

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata,NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Number of nuclei detected in the segment (if applicable)

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Number of reads with Quality >= 30.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Reads not yet analyzed in any way to be used for data analysis. The number of reads that pass filter from the flow cell represented in the FASTQ file.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Represents consensus from the overlapping sequence of read 1 and 2. This is a % of the aligned reads that were overlapped and consensus confirmed, usually upward of 80% but less in terms of number of reads than aligned reads

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Is a sequence that has been aligned to a gene/probe. Typically these reads can number from the hundreds of thousands to tens of millions. In GeoMx alignment is via mapping the RTS ID to a white list of sequences that represent targets.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Is the replacement of blocks of duplicate data with a Virtual Index Pointer linking the new sub-block to the existing block of data in a duplicate repository. This is used to reduce the amount of space need to store the data.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Is the median of all negative control probes for a given segment. A measure of signal to background for each segment.

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI DCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: Is the median count from all probes except the negative control probes. A measure of signal to background for each segment

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: ROI quality control flag as reported by the application

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: The binding density as reported by the application

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: The Positive Control Normalization factor calculated using pos-hyb controls

Manifest Name: NanoString GeoMx DSP ROI RCC Segment Annotation Metadata
Description: e.g. CD45 or PanCK (if masking was performed)

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: Complementary DNA. A DNA copy of an mRNA or complex sample of mRNAs, made using reverse transcriptase

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: A method for adding extra channels of information to cells by running single-cell gene expression in parallel with other assays [https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/software/pipelines/latest/feature-bc]

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2
Description: Hard Trimming was applied

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Length of spot barcode read (in bp): number
Conditional If: Spatial Read2 is "Spatial Barcode and UMI"

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Start position of UMI barcode in the sequence. Values: number, 0 for start of read
Conditional If: Spatial Read2 is "Spatial Barcode and UMI"

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: Length of UMI barcode read (in bp): number
Conditional If: Spatial Read2 is "Spatial Barcode and UMI"

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: The External RNA Controls Consortium (ERCC) spike in set is commonly used in single-cell experiments for normalization

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: Offset in sequence for cDNA read (in bp): number

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: Length of cDNA read (in bp): number

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 1
Description: Unique ID for this feature. Must not contain whitespace, quote or comma characters. Each ID must be unique and must not collide with a gene identifier from the transcriptome [https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/software/pipelines/latest/using/feature-bc-analysis#feature-ref]

Manifest Name: 10x Visium Spatial Transcriptomics - RNA-seq Level 2
Description: Read length used for alignment if hard trimming was applied
Conditional If: Applied Hard Trimming is "Yes - Applied Hard Trimming"

Manifest Name: Slide-seq Level 1
Description: The final concentration or dilution (for commercial sets) of the spike in mix [PMID:21816910]
